events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our company.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering for the Software Engineer role.
A recruiter from our engineering team has been assigned to your profile and will guide you through the next steps.
We completed your initial screening and are impressed with your experience in software development and system design.
Thank you for the update. I am excited about the opportunity and look forward to the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 7th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview concluded successfully. Your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency were noted positively.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on April 10th at 1:00 PM UTC to discuss culture fit and benefits.
The HR interview was completed and the feedback is very positive regarding your alignment with company values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
The candidate expressed enthusiasm about the offer and requested some additional details about the onboarding process.
We have received confirmation that you accepted the offer and are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has commenced, including setup of development environments and initial team introductions.
The recruitment process is officially closed. Welcome onboard as a Software Engineer, and we look forward to your success.
